website_summaries.verdict: Popular instant print camera that's colorful and a lot of fun for all ages.
pros: Little camera that's easy to handle and carry anywhere
Using instant print cameras at parties is a lot of fun
Novices can pick up this camera and begin using it successfully immediately out of the box
Good price point for an instant print camera
cons: Tiny prints aren't of a high quality

customer_reviews.title: Mathematically the best deal
customer_reviews.text: Shopping separately (and rounding the amount for the sake of being simple): the camera is $60. The film is $15. And the carrying case is $15. That’s $90 altogether. Subtract $90 from the total cost of the purchase, and that’s what you paid for all nicknacks (the paper decorations, lenses, album etc.) some bundles are $120 and such meaning you paid $30 for the extra stuff which shouldn’t be worth more than $5. This is the best deal for a bundle.
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: The camera is good. And I like the included accessories
customer_reviews.text: The camera is good. And I like the included accessories. But unfortunately, it did not come with the film. That was the whole reason for buying this particular package and it wasn’t in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas. She specifically wanted the ice blue one. It came quickly just as expected with all the accessories. Yes the instructions are in another language and the packaging, but that really wasn’t a big deal for us. The camera is super easy to setup. Yes the photo album says “pieces of moment” but my daughter loved that especially. She said it’s unique. Extremely pleased with my purchase. Now if she could stop going through the film so fast we would be great!! Hehe.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I loooooove my cameras sooo cute, and everything that comes with it is just sooooooo cute!!!!!!! The only thing is that photo quality is not es expected, is very nice but not as I thought. And picture takes atlas 5 second to finish coming out! lol overall it is nice. Not 5 starts, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Franco de Marín

customer_reviews.title: "Best gift ever"
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my 12 yr old granddaughter. She mentioned wanting it and I was excited to see her wanting something "old school". It was a huge hit. The camera worked great and she loved having real pictures to hang on her mirror and share with her friends
customer_reviews.author: K. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for kiddos or teens
customer_reviews.text: Fun!! It’s great to have the younger generation experience the camera and film like when I was young. Price is good, lots of stuff included But note- film is only 10 pictures and it is not cheap Would recommend for a gift
customer_reviews.author: Mnkdm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a 13th birthday gift for our child. Glad we didn't buy it at a store because it didn't come with any extras. We saw this deal on Amazon and knew we had to buy it. It was shipped overseas and came quickly with no damage to the box. It's very easy to use with the cutest neon color and over the shoulder bag. The picture quality came out much better than we expected. It also came with a cute photo album that is the perfect size for the photos, stickers, etc. Everything was included as mentioned. Our child loves it and being social will put it to good use
customer_reviews.author: Uri

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: This had to be the cutest little camera! My 15 yr old loved it! Remindes me of back when I used Polaroid instant cameras. The case is super cute and all the accessories included to make crafty frames and hues are an added bonus to making this fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: 3GRLSMOM

customer_reviews.title: Great value bundle
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bundle for my teenage niece because this is the best bundle I’ve found. It pretty much includes everything you can possibly need to get out and start snapping photos. She was ecstatic to have received it, and says it’s the best gift ever. There are no complaints at all, everything functions as it should. All the accessories were cute and useful. I highly recommend this bundle. Great value for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my little sister and she absolutely loved it! I like how easy to use it is and the pictures come out nicely. It has a nice filter for those gals who want to look like they have clear skin lol. I didn't have any makeup on so assumed all my blemishes would be caught, but nope! My face looked so clean and soft like a baby's! I definitely recommend this as kids also enjoy that a quick photo is developed.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: I love this little Vintage-Now camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this little Vintage-Now camera. I'm glad I got the package with all the extra accessories, it was really fund to take pictures and then spruce them up with the little frames and stickers included. Also I really like that you can take pictures while the case is on. It makes it really nice! The only thing I wish is that it came with more film, and the film is pretty pricey. But other than that it's a really cute and fun camera to use
customer_reviews.author: Jaden Rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my adult children for Christmas and although they are both into high tech items, they loved these! I love the colors they come in and enjoy seeing little pictures of my animals stuck around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Value for a great camera package
customer_reviews.text: Incredible package...bought this for my son and he loves it! Brings me back to the pre-digital camera days when we used to have the Polaroids! This package has everything! And, this seller had it much, much less than anyone else on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Scott

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter for her 6th grade graduation present. She had been wanting one for a long time. It is cute to look at but does not function properly. I wish we never bought it. More than half of the pictures appear to have been exposed so they turn out black or white. I would not reccommend this item. Seller sent us a free extra pack of film, and they still do not take. We think light is seeping into the aperature and causing exposure to the films. Would like a refund for the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Instant Camera
customer_reviews.text: This whole kit has been awesome! I took it on a vacations with me and having the case plus the memory book really helped! If you are traveling by plane, be careful and make security hand check the film since it can get destroyed in the X-ray machine. Other than that, I love everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: Meinholz12

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera for your #VSCO Girl
customer_reviews.text: My step daughter LOVES this camera. With the #VSCO Girl thing trending at her school, I knew she had to have it! Her Mom thought the same way and now she has one at each house so she never has to go anywhere without it! Nifty nostalgic throwback, and worth the money! Mind you, the pictures are much more clear than the classic Polaroid we know and love, but still not as crisp as digital. Anyway, still worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Marie

customer_reviews.title: Fun birthday present for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent birthday gift for our eight year old who didn’t need more toys! The set is awesome with fun extras for the kids to play with. She loves the matching camera bag and photo album especially and has been writing messages on the paper frames and giving them to people when she takes their picture. Picture quality obviously can’t compare to digital images but she loves the Polaroid effect of watching it develop. Happy parent over here!
customer_reviews.author: M. Newman

customer_reviews.title: I bought this bundle for my grandkids for Christmas. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bundle for my grandkids for Christmas. I ordered it in October. The snap on the case for it won’t stay snapped and I can’t return it because it’s been too long. Just realizing that it’s not an actual Instax case it’s an after market one. I thought it would be an instax case since it was a bundle. Wish it would of said that in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher H.

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my daughter; my oldest had one. The package and everything about the camera was great until my daughter used a lens cover that was sent with the camera. The lens on the camera will not stay on; this is obviously an issue with the cover or he camera lens not being installed correctly. Not sure how best to get it fixed; I have a sad 9 year old who is afraid to use her camera and have the lens get lost.
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Bad film bad day
customer_reviews.text: Have had many Polaroids over the many years but so far this is my least favorite model. We went with the bundle hoping for everything wed need without the hassle of multiple purchases to get what we needed. Comes with two packs of film and one whole pack did not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Treva Davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera great gift idea!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great !!! I think the price was amazing and I cant believe the quality of the pictures it takes.... It is a great purchase for yourself or I also think it is a great gift idea... I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a great camera...
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this, it doesn’t work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a Christmas present for my daughter. She has been wanting one for awhile now and it didn’t work. All the lights were flashing. Followed the directions on replacing the battery with the power on, used both of the films because the first one didn’t work and it was the same for the second pack. The fist one never came out. (I have another Polaroid so I know how it works.) all in all, very disappointing. Return is being processed now. The box said new and there were no signs of damage so it seems it is just broken before it was even packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Pia

customer_reviews.title: Be still shoot during the day
customer_reviews.text: This isn't your old Polaroid with a large flash. The flash is small. Best to shoot in bright light and have a steady hand. You get a lot of accessories for the price and it is fun to use for a budding photographer or photo enthusiaist. Would not but for any serious photographer
customer_reviews.author: Truism

customer_reviews.title: wasn't too sure if it would be something she'd like but I thought back to when I was her ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for an 8 year olds birthday gift, wasn't too sure if it would be something she'd like but I thought back to when I was her age and I loved my camera, after she opened it and I showed her how to use it, its safe to say she loved it and we were purchasing more film the next day. Highly recommend, i'm actually tempted to get myself one.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Shower gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughters wedding reception. She wans to do the mini pictures for her " guest book" . I priced the items individually, and found this was a better value. Im giving this to my daughter as a shower gift, can't wait for her to try it out!
customer_reviews.author: nursenancy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well at all!!
customer_reviews.text: When my daughter got this camera she was SO excited but she could not figure it out at all. Once she did figure it out she was SO happy but then it stopped working. We thought the film had been exposed. When we put the other film in it its still did not work! We are so so so upset! she was really excited to get it but it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: Bundle buy is good buy they shipped the wrong camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter and selected to purchase the ice blue/green color fuji camera but they shipped me a white camera with white accessories. My dsughter was happy that she got a camera, even though it wasn't the camera color and accessories I chose and paid for.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny .
customer_reviews.text: I love watching my daughter take real photos like I did as a young kid. Nothing like having those real memories. Pictures are tiny but visible. You have to remember what you are purchasing. I enjoy how she brings the scrapbook to live and we found alot of frames for this size photos as well
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Murray

customer_reviews.title: Received the camera on time and everything looks great!! I bought as a gift for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the camera on time and everything looks great!! I bought as a gift for my goddaughter, so much fun stuff for her to use. Package came with a set of batteries as well. I'm happy with purchase and price I paid. Will update once I give to her and she starts using it :)
customer_reviews.author: S&M

customer_reviews.title: Overall good deal. Case is detachable.
customer_reviews.text: Very fun to use and the pictures create cute small photos that are fairly good quality. They include: -case (decent quality, very nice that you can detach part of it) -frames (cheap plastic, it's ok) -sticker backgrounds (cute ones, decent amount) -extra lens (haven't used but looks like they will work fine, not sure how useful the colors are) -string of clothes pins and frames (variety of colors, decent) -photo album (cute, holds 64+1 on the front cover)
customer_reviews.author: YuShen Su

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my teenaged daughter. She is always getting together with friends and going places so this camera was a great idea. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for my daughter. She absolutely loved it. This product was definitely worth the price. I love the moments we can capture and keep them in a memory book that came with the camera. Great job with all the accessories and cute filters. My daughter loves it she can't get enough of it. She's my little photographer now.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi Summerville

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a lot of accessories
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters birthday and she loved it. Some pictures never developed which upset her and some didn’t develop all the way but it came with a lot of little albums and the case is great.
customer_reviews.author: Cheye

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves this, but it is something she can use when she's a teen, too! I even like to use it! Taking Pictures never gets old. They are good pictures. And the photo album and accessories are great, also. The film is pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her birthday along with the other items you could add to it. It doesn't work at all the film comes out black and now it is too late to return. It you order this camera please check to make sure it works before gifting it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ellis

customer_reviews.title: was excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter, and I have to say out of ALL her gifts, she just hasn't stopped playing with her camera. In my holiday frenzy I accidentally ordered this camera twice, customer service regarding the refund, was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: df

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good camera and the pics are good too. For a beginner photographer this is a great camera to rlly test if u love taking pics. The overall package is a greattt deal. It takes maybe 2 minutes to develop. Also it got to me in 3 days from the day ordered witch is very quick. Just be careful if your are in an areas where packages are often stolen or such be careful because they put multiple stickers on the top of the package that says exactly what was in the box. So everyone can see what’s in the package. But great deal
customer_reviews.author: Emily torres

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter thought this was awesome. The film is pretty expensive at $1 per ...
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter thought this was awesome. The film is pretty expensive at $1 per picture and they are really small. No do overs.....once you've taken the picture that is all there is to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More Film
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these for my Nieces and they love it. They are 10 and 11 years old... The photo book to put the pictures filled up fast and the film it came out ran out fast.
customer_reviews.author: JD McNeely

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: The camera worked like a charm and the guests enjoyed snapping pics and reminiscing on the original "instant pics era". The package has everything you need to get up and clicking, along wiyh other cute items. I'm verry happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Che

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift for the tween girl in your life!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter saved and saved for this and she was ecstatic when it arrived! She was not disappointed! She continues to use the camera months later and it is simple enough for her to load and use on her own! I would highly recommend this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Rowell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great cameras! my kids love them and love taking pictures with them. they are super easy to use and light weight. The film is a little on the pricey side but still cute pictures. his bundle comes with a great amount of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Pictures come out too dark
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my daughter. She couldn't be happier. The film tends to be extremely sensitive. Everything comes out dark. So, make sure you balance your lighting well. Best for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Spinelli

customer_reviews.title: Check to make sure you recived everything,the film was not included and I had to go out on Christmas eve to get some.
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated this a five but it did not come with the film as stated. So on Christmas eve I was out buying film so my granddaughter could use the camera.
customer_reviews.author: TAMI SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible package - camera is a mini 9 and all the accessories say for a mini 8. Makes no sense that they would package these items together !
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and pictured. The color is amazing and the added goodies are a must. It was my daughters birthday present and she LOVeD it
customer_reviews.author: Chaka  Khach Kornelli

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for 9 year olds and up!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my daughter. She is 9 years old. She truly loves it. The bag for the camera is awesome. The cute little frames for the pictures are just awesome. The film was easy to insert. Just be ready to purchase extra film. Taking pictures of everyone and every thing can be very fun!
customer_reviews.author: Edukada95

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them busy
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2! One for each of my 2 12 year old granddaughters for Christmas. They loved the camera kits. We also bought each one an extra photo package.👧👧❤️
customer_reviews.author: Curt erskine

customer_reviews.title: impressive as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift, was very well received and it’s impressive in general. Don’t expect much of picture quality. It’s more for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great gifting idea
customer_reviews.text: 100% would make a great gift. I bought it for myself though I got everything pictured and listed and the camera works great It is hard to take pictures when it’s too bright out though
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Spade

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My niece was thrilled this is a great set for a great price comes with everything you need to keep you entertain for hours and since the camera alone is $60/$70 this was a steal at $100
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Very nice package
customer_reviews.text: My grand is graduating high school and wanted this camera. I tried to talk her into an SLR but she wanted this one. Her other Gma is taking her to Europe and she wants this for her trip. She absolutely loves it. Just what she wanted
customer_reviews.author: Chili Jean

customer_reviews.title: Poor picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color & case. All the accessories in the package were very nice. The picture quality is POOR. Guess I was expecting better.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis E.

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who loves it -set was well made and has a lot of accessories- I would buy this product again thanks guys
customer_reviews.author: Henry B

customer_reviews.title: "Instant" Memory Keeper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the intention of capturing instant moments for friends and family on Christmas eve and im sure it won't disappoint. A few friends and I tried it out when it arrived and it was a blast! It's easy to use, load the film & it arrived on time with all the extras as promised. The pink is also a fun color.
customer_reviews.author: izmyster

customer_reviews.title: Im so angry about product
customer_reviews.text: I order this for a friends birthday and the product said it comes with film but whrn i got itit had no film. No cover or photo album. Im very angry about it
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my daughter for her birthday, she has had it for less than 2 months and it has stopped working. I would not recommend purchasing. Unfortunately, it stopped working after the window for our return date so we were unable to return or exchange for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, Tons of accessories
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 11yo daughter -- she loved it -- it is very easy to use the camera/load the film/add the color lenses etc. Very glad batteries were included. This was a great gift for her birthday - we purchased extra film and albums for the kids at the party so everyone could take home a memento.
customer_reviews.author: KerryO

customer_reviews.title: Instamatic camera
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved this. Opened at Xmas and used it immediately. Can buy film anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Carol-Anne Quinn

customer_reviews.title: sparks creativity
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old Granddaughter had a great time taking photos after her Parents gave the basic instructions on it's use! The frames that were included are very cute, and popular! They plan to use the "clothesline" photo display. Initially there was confusion on how to connect the filters but did figure that out. Overall, very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: debbie hendryx

customer_reviews.title: it's a great little camera to carry around
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter. She loved it! She like the color she liked that it is compact, she likes carrying it around places, and the ability to see the pictures instantly. Also, the little paper frames are cute. The plastic frames are nice too, and she really liked the photo album.
customer_reviews.author: Pattycakes

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter loved it. Comes with all kinds of goodies and pretty cool how you get stickers to decorate the front of the camera. Pictures come out looking good as well. The color of the camera is pretty and its great having the case for easy carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Elvebak

customer_reviews.title: Would spring for the digital printer
customer_reviews.text: Buying for a young one with a camera on there phone you definitely need to explain how to take your time to take each shot. Daughter ran out of film in a day
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Budding youn photographer
customer_reviews.text: this was the perfect gift for my nine year old granddaughter. She was snapping family memories as soon as she got this camera out o the box. She is very happy with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: Instax Camera
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love the camera, and right out the box she was ready to take pictures. She also was able to make picture album. Thank you for make easy for us putting together this Instax camera package.
customer_reviews.author: Rogerio Pionorio

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 10 year old sister for Christmas and it’s perfect, it came with everything shown Including batteries and the wrist strap came inside the box as well. I would definitely recommend buying this as a gift for someone
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Take great pictures
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand daughter’s 10 th birthday. She was thrilled with it. She was able to use it right away and took great pictures of all of us. It was one of the best gifts 🎁 iHave bought.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet O'hara

customer_reviews.title: Loved the camera, could have done without the accessories
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift, love the camera and the case. Most of the accessories are unused and still in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Kids love
customer_reviews.text: This was the popular tween Christmas present request. The photo quality is very retro (aka not great) but the kids love it so it's all good. The seller offered a nice package deal at a competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Librajen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Came in early got this for my little sisters birthday cant wait to give it to her ☺️
customer_reviews.author: amairani perez

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 yr old daughter's birthday. She absolutely loves it. The film is expensive but she loves taking pictures with it. Easy to use and lots of fun accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jones

customer_reviews.title: Take time to explain the extras to the children
customer_reviews.text: The added photo supplies and case for the camera. Great beginner craft for both boys and girls.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! A bit expensive. Not everyone can afford it. Got it for my grand daughter. She loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Wood

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this camera it came early which was good and it’s a awesome gift to give and the price isn’t bad for everything that comes with the camera in all this was a great camera
customer_reviews.author: Sharanjit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Literally, all my 12 year old daughter ask for for Christmas was art supplies and this camera. She was clearly very excited when she opened it! It works perfect! And I also love that it came with all sorts of extra goodies. Definitely recommending this!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Polaroids are all the rage again and my teenage sister is obsessed. I got this for her and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Pyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this camera. I get compliments on it (and the photos). I love all the extras. Would definitely make an awesome gift. Film is pricey but it’s good to use for special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Scribner

customer_reviews.title: So cute and old time fun
customer_reviews.text: Great item for a bridal shower! Have not used it yet but will in a few weeks. This does come with batteries which seemed to be a question no one knew the answer to.
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and was everything the ad said. I bought it for my 13 yr old granddaughter and she absolutely loves the camera and all the accessories. She has a wall full of photos. Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Love it but......
customer_reviews.text: The product came on time the only thing two articles were missing the first one was the microfiber cloth and the second I only received 10 of the colored film stickers. I but two of this camaras my cousin received all the articles but I didn’t other that I believe is a good deal. Going to the park to take soon pictures let’s hope for the best.
customer_reviews.author: rosa ruiz

customer_reviews.title: This camera is fantastic. Bought it for a graduation party to do ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is fantastic. Bought it for a graduation party to do a scrapbook. The accessory kit is a lot of fun and all the kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: danielle sitarski

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, all of my pictures have turned out great despite the other reviews saying they received a faulty camera. The picture quality is what you would expect from a Polaroid and gives that vintage feel.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M.

customer_reviews.title: They are very easy to use and the granddaughters just absolutely love them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Lime Green and Pink Fuji Mini Instant camera sets for my granddaughters ages 10 and 12. They are very easy to use and the granddaughters just absolutely love them. They enjoy taking their own pictures and being able to see them instantly. They say their GeeGee (me, the grandmother) always gets them the coolest gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Book

customer_reviews.title: Great experiance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter as a gift she loves it really good quality. I received shipment fast and I am very please with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, this lovely set,was a present for my daughter 9th birthday, came on time and she loves it! Thanks a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really great gift! My daughter loves it and it takes a pretty good picture.
customer_reviews.author: Porsche808

customer_reviews.title: A great buy

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loved This!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a Granddaughter's birthday. She was thrilled with the camera and all the accessories. She now has a camera like big sister's. I don't know how well it works yet, but will let you know if there are any problems. It shipped quickly and was packaged well.Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! love it bought it for my granddaughter! This is the second one I bought, the first one was for me..
customer_reviews.author: Edna Wall

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the cost
customer_reviews.text: The package with the Instax camera and all the accessories was great. This was a gift for a 12 year old and she loved it. She immediately figured out how to use all the accessories and starting taking pictures right away. The kit only comes with one package of film so be prepared to buy extra. The camera is super easy is use and the pictures come out pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her camera and the pictures are a very good quality for a Polaroid. She has fun designing the pictures with the different accessories that come in the bundle

customer_reviews.text: Item was perfect. It was a Xmas gift and she was beyond thrilled. The selfies came out stunning, than you, will definitely be buying the next one from you.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My niece went crazy over this camera! And the extras made her day! This package is a great value and a perfect gift!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift - good quality, fun
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered several of these as gifts. Each person I've gifted it to has loved it. Would buy more as gifts. Great product, fun for people of all ages, pictures are good as party favors too.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend’s daughter. She absolutely loved it, especially the fact she could decorate it. I highly recommend buying the camera with this additional bundle.

product_meta.title: Fujifilm Instax Mini 9 Camera + Fuji INSTAX Instant Film (20 Sheets) + 14 PC Instax Accessories kit Bundle, Includes; Instax Case + Album + Frames & Stickers + Lens Filters + More (Ice Blue)
feature_bullets: VALUE BUNDLE - Includes Everything from The Camera & Film to its Essential Accessory kit, all for the Same Low Price!
POLAROID GIFT SET - Great for Children & Teenagers, Girl/Boyfriends. HAPPINESS GUARANTEE or Your Money Back (30 Days)
INSTANT CAMERA – Its Built-In Flash, Special Modes & Settings Allows Quality Images in Different Lighting & Conditions
INSTAX FILM (20 SHEETS) - Compact Credit Card-Sized - Excellent Sharpness & Vibrant Colors Delivers High Image Clarity

ACCESSORIES INCLUDES - Matching Custom Instax case w/ strap, 64 pocket Photo album, 4x color lens filters, 10x hang frames w/ clips & string, 5x plastic frames, 20x frame stickers, Camera decoration sticker, Matching close-up lens, Ultra-gentle microfiber cleaning cloth
